@graph.name: Eggless Waffles with Cherry Sauce (Vegan) - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These eggless waffles with cherry sauce are perfect for the weekend! They're super easy to make, so delicious, and 100 % vegan. SO good!

@graph.headline: Eggless Waffles with Cherry Sauce (Vegan)
@graph.keywords: cherry waffles,cherry waffles recipe,eggless waffles,eggless waffles recipe,vegan waffles,vegan waffles recipe,waffles without egg,waffles without egg recipe

@graph.name: Eggless Waffles with Cherry Sauce (Vegan)
@graph.description: These vegan waffles with cherry sauce are not only super delicious but also really easy to make! Sprinkle them with a little bit of powdered sugar and cinnamon and you're good to go. They're one of my all-time favorite vegan breakfast recipes!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour (You could also use whole wheat flour)
4 tablespoons of the syrup the cherries are in

recipeInstructions.text: For the waffles, combine all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl and stir well with a wooden spoon. Lightly grease a waffle iron and make six waffles.
recipeInstructions.name: For the waffles, combine all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl and stir well with a wooden spoon. Lightly grease a waffle iron and make six waffles.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the cherry sauce. Drain the cherries. Keep some of the syrup the cherries are in as you'll need it later on. Transfer the cherries to a small pot and heat them up. Combine the corn starch with two tablespoons of water and add them to the cherries together with the syrup. Cook for about 3 minutes or until it thickens up.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the cherry sauce. Drain the cherries. Keep some of the syrup the cherries are in as you'll need it later on. Transfer the cherries to a small pot and heat them up. Combine the corn starch with two tablespoons of water and add them to the cherries together with the syrup. Cook for about 3 minutes or until it thickens up.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the waffles with the cherry sauce and sprinkle with cinnamon and powdered sugar. If you want you can also add some maple syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the waffles with the cherry sauce and sprinkle with cinnamon and powdered sugar. If you want you can also add some maple syrup.
